greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Filter sequence for a(primes > 3) = constant sequences.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..100000
formula: For n <= 5, a(n) = n, for >= 5, a(n) = 5 when n is a prime, and a(n) = 3+n-A000720(n) when n is a composite.
xref: Cf. also A305901, A305902, A305903 (this filter applied to various permutations of N).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jun 14 2018
